sections.heading: Learn More about Detectron2
sections.text:
Explain Like Iâ€™m 5: Detectron2
Using Machine Learning with Detectron2

sections.heading: What's New
sections.text:
Includes new capabilities such as panoptic segmentation, Densepose, Cascade R-CNN, rotated bounding boxes, PointRend,
DeepLab, ViTDet, MViTv2 etc.
Used as a library to support building
research projects
on top of it.
Models can be exported to TorchScript format or Caffe2 format for deployment.
It
trains much faster
.
See our
blog post
to see more demos and learn about detectron2.

sections.heading: Getting Started
sections.text:
See
Getting Started with Detectron2
,
and the
Colab Notebook
to learn about basic usage.
Learn more at our
documentation
.
And see
projects/
for some projects that are built on top of detectron2.

sections.heading: Model Zoo and Baselines
sections.text:
We provide a large set of baseline results and trained models available for download in the
Detectron2 Model Zoo
.

sections.heading: License
sections.text:
Detectron2 is released under the
Apache 2.0 license
.

sections.heading: Citing Detectron2

metadata.description: Detectron2 is a platform for object detection, segmentation and other visual recognition tasks.
